mutants.code:
def get_unique_name(vdir, names):
    base_name = vdir.split('/')[-1]
    unique_name = base_name
    counter = 2
    while unique_name in names:
        unique_name = f'{base_name}_{counter}'
        counter += 1
    names.append(unique_name)
    return unique_name

def get_unique_name(vdir, names):
    base_name = vdir.split('/')[-1]
    unique_name = base_name
    counter = 1
    while unique_name not in names:
        unique_name = f'{base_name}_{counter}'
        counter += 1
    names.append(unique_name)
    return unique_name

def get_unique_name(vdir, names):
    base_name = vdir.split('/')[-1]
    unique_name = base_name
    counter = 1
